title: Una Muerte en Cozumel
description: What began as a week of Spring Break fun for four college friends in the paradise like setting of Cozumel Island in Mexico, ended in the mysterious disappearance of one of them and another being charged with her murder, even though a body was never found. Michael J. Rock is hired by a wealthy businessman to prove that his son did not commit this terrible crime. After meeting the young man, Michael is not so sure of his innocence. Still he sets off on an adventure that is fraught with double crosses, greed and dangerous men and women who could very well bring about the destruction of Michael J. Rock, Private Investigator; as he attempts to prove one way or the other, whether the woman was actually killed and who really was responsible.
author: Michael G. Edwards
